div.head: CHAP. C.
1 An exhortation to praise God cheerefully, 3 for his greatnesse, 4 and for his power.
div.ab: [A Psalme of praise.] Make a ioyfull noise vnto the Lord, all ye lands. Hebr. all the earth.
Serue the Lord with gladnes: come before his presence with singing.
Know ye that the Lord, hee is God, it is he that hath made vs, and not we our selues: wee are his people, and the sheepe of his pasture. Or, and his we are.
Enter into his gates with thanksgiuing, and into his Courts with praise: bee thankfull vnto him, and blesse his Name.
For the Lord is good, his mercy is euerlasting: and his trueth endureth to all generations. Hebr. to generation, and generation.
